sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-card>
<!--        <el-row :gutter="20" class="top">-->
<!--            <el-button type="primary" :icon="DocumentAdd" @click="handleAddDialog()">添加题目类型</el-button>-->
<!--        </el-row>-->
        <el-table :data="tableData" stripe style="width: 100%">
            <el-table-column prop="id" label="ID" width="100" />
            <el-table-column prop="content" label="题目" width="200" />
            <el-table-column prop="description" label="描述" width="200" />
            <el-table-column prop="surveyCateId" label="分类ID" width="200" />
            <el-table-column prop="surveyItemIds" label="选项ID" width="200" />
            <el-table-column prop="action" label="操作" width="200" fixed="right">
                <template v-slot="scope">
<!--                    <el-button type="primary" :icon="Edit"-->
<!--                               @click="handleEditDialog(scope.row.id)">-->
<!--                    </el-button>-->
<!--                    <el-button type="danger" :icon="Delete"-->
<!--                               @click="handleDelete(scope.row.id)">-->
<!--                    </el-button>-->
                </template>
            </el-table-column>
        </el-table>
    </el-card>
</template>

<script setup>
import {Delete, DocumentAdd, Edit} from "@element-plus/icons-vue";
import {ref} from "vue";
import axios from "@/util/axios";

const tableData = ref([]);

const initList = async () => {
    const res = await axios.get('/api/survey-question/all');
    tableData.value = res.data.data.surveyQuestions;
}
initList();
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>

</style>
